name: Rusher Crusher
description:
Rusher Crusher

Awful and Cute pixelated monsters attack your favorite city! 

Your Rusher Crusher team can stop it, but you have only 10 sec because you forgot to buy gasoline.

Controls:

Click on mouse or Tap on the phone.

Credits:Music

The following music was used for this media project:

1) Music: Driving to the Night by Frank Schroeter

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/8085-driving-to-the-night

2) Music: 8-Bit Chip by Frank Schroeter

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/8877-8-bit-chip

3) Music: Foley Is Back by Frank Schroeter

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/8420-foley-is-back

Artist on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/frank.schroeter.52

4) Music: Disco Club by WinnieTheMoog

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/7203-disco-club

Artist website: https://linktr.ee/taigasoundprod
